Bibliographic References: PP, no. 51, pi. lie and fig. 23; PPSupp, no. 63, detail: Paquette, L'Instument de musique. pp. 126Non Sepcified7, fig. C47.
Imagery Description: Apollo and Marsyas—small temple, beside which is seated Marsyas, playing the flute, Apollo seated with cithara, seated Muse with cithara, seated Muse with open box and wreath, seated Muse holding lyre.
